title: Mens Fleece Lined Jeans Straight Leg Stretch Winter Warm Denim Pants
description: -Fleece Lining:Fleece lining is soft, and warm, these men's pants are perfect for winter outings, no need to worry about adding bulk, will keep you warm in cold weather.
-Stretch: These pants are straight cut for added stretch and strength, and the loose fit gives your legs plenty of room to move, allowing you to wear them comfortably while working outdoors.
-Benefits: the fabric is soft and comfortable, not easy to pilling, not easy to lose hair, have good stretch, don't worry about restricting your leg movement.
-Features: fleece lined jeans, thick, warm, high stretch, winter warm jeans, straight leg jeans, four pockets, plus size, loose fit, zipper, loose fit
